EmailTemplate.description: Email to July cohort reminding them to submit their plan
EmailTemplate.name: July Grant Submission Reminder
EmailTemplate.subject: Reminder: Submit your Digital Transformation Plan!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Good morning {!Contact.FirstName},
This is just a reminder that you have less than 2 weeks to submit your Digital Transformation Plan if you have not already.
Your plan must be submitted here: https://cityoftoronto.tfaforms.net/355909
If you have any questions please let me know.
Regards,
-Darryl
